name: milky coco pops
detailedDescription: Sugar, chocolate, puffed rice and milk. They're starting to go a bit soggy and turn the milk brown.

attributes.smell: They smell pretty appetising. Sweet and chocolatey.
attributes.sound: You put your ear to them. They make little muted snap, crackle and pop noises
attributes.taste: The coolness of the milk combines deliciously with the sweet chocolate of the coco pops. Tasty!
